questions.text: Do you vote to continue the Tangle Community Treasury with a revised framework for the 2024 to 2025 term?

answers.additionalInfo: Yes, I approve the TCT for the 2024 to 2025 term
No, I do not approve the TCT for the 2024 to 2025 term

questions.additionalInfo: The Shimmer voters agree to allocate 22,216,844 million SMR Tokens through a donation to the TCT Grant Committee for grant funding. Also, the voters agree to donate an additional 3,173,834 SMR to the TCT Grant Committee to build a Funding integration. The Shimmer voters accept the operation specification in the following proposal [IGP-0002-SGP-0007-Tangle-Community-Treasury-for-2024-to-2025-term](https://govern.iota.org/t/igp-0002-sgp-0007-tangle-community-treasury-for-2024-to-2025-term/1713a
